keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: In a report to Congress seen, the department said it was “gravely concerned” about abuses against the Rohingya, but it did not constitute genocide.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Myanmar: State Dept. Says Persecution of Muslims Does Not Rise to Genocide
headline.main: Myanmar: State Dept. Says Persecution of Muslims Does Not Rise to Genocide

snippet: In a report to Congress seen, the department said it was “gravely concerned” about abuses against the Rohingya, but it did not constitute genocide.
abstract: State Dept, in report to Congress, determines persecution of Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar is gravely concerning but finds abuses do not constitute genocide.
